pf2t.name: Flexible Spellcaster
pf2t.body: You've learned how to cast spells flexibly, blending the best elements of spontaneous and prepared spellcasting at the cost of casting fewer spells each day.

name: Flexible Spellcaster Dedication
details: You now have four cantrips per day instead of three. At 4th level, you have five cantrips per day instead of four.

pf2t.name: Flexible Spellcaster Dedication
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Flexible Spellcaster
**Prerequisites** flexible spell preparation

- - -

You now have four cantrips per day instead of three. At 4th level, you have five cantrips per day instead of four.
